snippet: Chris Froome of Britain won the Critérium du Dauphiné, closing out his victory in Risoul, France, and immediately setting his sights on the Tour de France.
abstract: British cyclist Chris Froome wins the Criterium du Dauphine, closing out his victory in Risoul, France, and immediately setting his sights on Tour de France.
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome of Britain won the Critérium du Dauphiné, closing out his victory in Risoul, France, and immediately setting his sights on the Tour de France.

headline.seo: Chris Froome of Britain Wins Critérium du Dauphiné
headline.main: Froome First in Tour de France Tuneup
